reviewText: A wonderful version of this timeless gem The characters are brought to life by the talented voice actors. The Boy, the Skin Horse, Doctor and Fairy are real!
I bought this movie for my daughter who loved it when she borrowed it from the library.  It is a very cute movie and my daughter (5 yrs) has watched it over and over.

This very charming update of a classic has its own special appeal to kids and adults. I heard of one four year old that watches it every day. You have to see it to see why it is so special. It's a classic among classics.
